learning.supervised.interfaces

Interface DiscreteDistToPointsQueryUserInterface


  • public interface DiscreteDistToPointsQueryUserInterface
    This interface declares the methods for classification that rely on the distances to all training set points. This can also be used for some kNN methods, though those methods also implement an interface that accepts kNN sets directly, along with the distances to training points. This interface declares the methods for DiscretizedDataInstance classification. There is a corresponding method for continuous valued standard DataInstances as well.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method performs classification of the target DataInstance.

      This method performs classification of the target DataInstance.

        Parameters:

        This method performs classification of the target DataInstance.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Integer that is the classification outcome, the prediction of the class label.
